reviewText: This DVD is like some one filmed it at home but it did its job if you like to learn to spray paint art but u can also youtube it
This is exactly what we were looking for! Steps were explained very well with great illustrations! I highly recommend this DVD for anyone who wants to learn spray paint art. It has helped us a lot!!
The DVD was informative and instructional.  Excellent DVD for anyone who wants to learn spray paint art.
